tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerable_population (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    rights_protected BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerable_population (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE rights_protection (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    population_id INT,
    protection_status VARCHAR(20),
    intervention TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (population_id) REFERENCES vulnerable_population(id)
);

CREATE TABLE VulnerablePopulation (
  person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ProtectionStatus (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  person_id INT,
  protection_level VARCHAR(20),
  protection_expiry_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES VulnerablePopulation(person_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerable_populations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerable_population (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	age INT,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	vulnerability_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE rights_protection (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	category VARCHAR(50),
	issue VARCHAR(100),
	description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_framework (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	law_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	rights_type VARCHAR(50),
	jurisdiction VARCHAR(50),
	year_enacted INT
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_groups (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	group_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	focus_area VARCHAR(100),
	contact_person VARCHAR(50),
	contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);
